pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenery shot captures the magnificent and opulent interior of a historic church or cathedral. The camera slowly pans and tilts across a grand altar alcove, revealing dark marble columns, intricate carvings, a large religious painting, and a lavishly gilded dome. The movement showcases the rich architectural details and grandeur of the sacred space.
